constraints.name: distinct_leq_k
constraints.description: 分配到相同住房的人数不超过 k 个

constraints.name: no_empty_houses
constraints.description: 每个住房必须至少有一个人居住，不能有空房

constraints.name: connected_components
constraints.description: 所有住房通过单向道路连接形成若干环，包括自环，且每个住房都有一条连向它的道路
constraints.formal: houses form (a_i - k) cycles, including self-loops, and each house has an incoming edge
